item.title: Is it a üê¶? Is it a ‚úàÔ∏è? No it's the mailcow on Twitter!
item.author: Author
item.description: Moohoo everyone! Our dear mailcow has taken the plunge into social media: Twitter! There she will provide you with new release information or small hints about possible new features as well as general information about the mailcow project. Of course you can also tweet about your experiences with mailcow. Just use the Twitter handle: @mailcow_email. We look forward to getting in touch with you there and keeping you up to date.
